result.markdown:
--- title: "Scaled cases" author: Raphael Saldanha date: last-modified --- This notebook aims to cluster the Brazilian municipalities considering scaled (standardized) dengue cases time-series similarities. ## Packages ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(tidyverse) library(lubridate) library(arrow) library(timetk) library(dtwclust) library(kableExtra) library(tictoc) source("../functions.R") ``` ::: ## Load data Load the aggregated data. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} tdengue <- open_dataset(sources = data_dir("bundled_data/tdengue.parquet")) %>% select(mun, date, cases) %>% collect() dim(tdengue) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] 1529052 3 ``` ::: ::: ### Prepare data The chunk bellow executes various steps to prepare the data for clustering. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} tdengue <- tdengue %>% # Prepare time series mutate(mun = paste0("m_", mun)) %>% arrange(mun, date) %>% pivot_wider(names_from = mun, values_from = cases) %>% select(-date) %>% t() %>% tslist() ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} length(tdengue) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] 3052 ``` ::: ::: ## Clustering Sequence of `k` groups to be used. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} k_seq <- 3:10 ``` ::: ### SBD method ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} tic() clust <- tsclust( series = tdengue, type = "partitional", k = k_seq, distance = "sbd", seed = 13 ) toc() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` 13.858 sec elapsed ``` ::: ::: ### Cluster Validity Indices (CVI) ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} names(clust) <- paste0("k_", k_seq) res_cvi <- sapply(clust, cvi, type = "internal") %>% t() %>% as_tibble(rownames = "k") %>% arrange(-Sil) res_cvi %>% kbl() %>% kable_styling() ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
k Sil SF CH DB DBstar D COP
k_5 0.1234309 0.2081118 300.0188 2.721173 3.297763 0.0419189 0.4021860
k_9 0.0958808 0.0399282 190.6314 2.925468 3.662420 0.0305865 0.3712797
k_4 0.0803864 0.2555620 433.2938 4.130769 4.660973 0.0307134 0.3819961
k_7 0.0733269 0.0787971 274.2234 2.801842 3.731409 0.0129989 0.3847807
k_3 0.0613460 0.3377519 701.2736 4.775565 5.487569 0.0148113 0.3999635
k_6 0.0378611 0.1058248 248.4534 4.170298 5.688314 0.0147972 0.3948488
k_10 0.0357078 0.0454849 189.8123 4.001129 5.212208 0.0250796 0.3604802
k_8 0.0287240 0.1000158 186.8813 154.783730 163.887630 0.0006579 0.3757191
````` ::: ::: ### Cluster with higher Silhouette statistic ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} sel_clust <- clust[[res_cvi[[1,1]]]] ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} plot(sel_clust) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](cluster_long_scaled_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-9-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} ggsave(filename = "cluster_long_scaled.pdf") ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Saving 7 x 5 in image ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} plot(sel_clust, type = "centroids", lty = 1) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](cluster_long_scaled_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-11-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: ### Cluster sizes ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} table(sel_clust@cluster) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` 1 2 3 4 5 1979 1 187 167 718 ``` ::: ::: ## Session info ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} sessionInfo() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` R version 4.3.1
